chapters.title: Introduction to Charan Kanya
chapters.description: Discover the concept of Charan Kanya, a term from Indian tradition symbolizing respect and reverence for a maiden.

chapters.title: Cultural Significance
chapters.description: Learn about the cultural and spiritual importance of Charan Kanya in Indian mythology and society.

chapters.title: Representation in Scriptures
chapters.description: Explore mentions of Charan Kanya in epics and Puranas, showcasing her ideal qualities.

chapters.title: Reverence and Rituals
chapters.description: Understand the rituals and practices associated with honoring a Charan Kanya in traditional settings.

chapters.title: Modern Interpretation
chapters.description: Reflect on how the concept of Charan Kanya is perceived and celebrated in contemporary society.
